fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Stalk a player's house at night, which may be your own. You will attack a random visitor.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- As long as a different visitor is available, you will avoid attacking the Harbinger.
- If nobody visits your target, you will kill your target instead.
- When Empowered, you will attack every visitor of the house you stalk.
- Conversion Immune and Astral
